readable.title: 3662963630_8f097e38d4
readable.content: A biker leaps off a half-pipe littered with graffiti as onlookers watch . a bmx rider launches off a quarterpipe . A cyclist airborne having jumped his bike off a graffiti covered ramp . A kid does a trick on a bike at a skate park . A teenage boy on a bicycle is jumping off a ramp .
